content:
You can attach a few files for test decryption by packing them into an archive with zip, rar, tar, 7zip, 7z, tar.gz extensions of no more than 10 megabytes using the attach button directly in the chat.

If your archive weighs more than 10 megabytes, please use our file sharing service.
http://lockbitfss2w7co3ij6am6wox4xcurtgwukunx3yubcoe5cbxiqakxqd.onion
http://lockbitfsvf75glg226he5inkfgtuoakt4vgfhd7nfgghx5kwz5zo3ad.onion
http://lockbitfskq2fxclyfrop5yizyxpzu65w7pphsgthawcyb4gd27x62id.onion
For security reasons we do not click on other links you send in chat.
Please wait for a reply, sometimes it takes several hours due to possible time zone differences.
hello, you have encrypted our mits.tirol domain , can you let us know the btc ammount please
20k usd
thank you for this , i hope this is negoiable , please can you also give me a screenshot or filetree of the tranfert data from our servers so i can convince my manager to pay the BTC
can you please give an update on my request
http://temp.sh/hYAwJ/tree_KEMATEN.txt
thank you for the list , i will go back to management and come to you

KEMATEN\IT\IT\HOWto\__Arbeitsberichte\Markus\2023\Arbeitsbereicht-Dr.Trieb-Grafikkarte.rtf

KEMATEN\IT\Wartungskunden\Tirol\20079_Hotel_Sportlers\IT\Netzwerktest.png

KEMATEN\IT\IT\Bilder\2021\2021.05.22 - Brom”bel Herstellung\20210522_193652 - Kopie.jpg
can you please send me these 3 files as proof you have our data so i can take this forward
wait
http://temp.sh/XgfVc/files_KEMATEN.zip
thank you please keep this channel open
the files are correct , let me know what i need to do to pay the 20k usd, what will happen if i pay the ammount please explain
decryptor + data deletion
data deletion please
can you also let us know how did you entered the network , very important for us thank you
please give me an update
yes we can
ok what is the next step ?
pay
what is the btc adres
bc1qp3cl68v8nstaxpqgjaq50rxmvrzen7lwva0wsl 0.25 BTC
we have forseen 0.23 is that ok please ?  once we pay you will share the enterin point and delete the data

hi , we will transfert 0.25 btc to the account , management wants to know if all questions below will be ok ? 
- we will receive a deletion protocol 
- the assurance that Lockbit (including its affiliates) will not attack MITS a second time
- MITS will not be published on their blog
- we will receive information on how they got into the IT system
yes
money is being transfert will send you proof once i have it
ok, we wait

- we will receive a deletion protocol
- the assurance that Lockbit (including its affiliates) will not attack MITS a second time
- MITS will not be published on their blog

Yes, wait for the answer to your request. We will prepare everything and send it to you shortly
thank you very much
